caption.title: Trajectory of MCMC chains with annealing temperature of 32.
caption.p:
The figure shows how MCMC chains evolved for each parameter R
g, s ( g = 1 or 2, s = 1,..5 or 6). Visual inspection indicated that only parameters related to 2013 (i.e., R 1,4, R 1,5, R 1,6, R 2,4 and R 1,5) reach the state of convergence. The judgment was consistent with GRC-based checking if a looser condition (GRC < 2) than a conventional one (GRC < 1.1) is employed.
Click here for additional data file.
